periodReminder.title: Upcoming period reminder
periodReminder.body: Your period is expected to start in {{days}} days, on {{date}}

periodStarting.title: Your period might start today
periodStarting.body: Your period might start today based on your cycle history. Log it in the app!

periodLate.title: Your period is late
periodLate.body: Your period was expected yesterday. Did you forget to log your period?
